Menteri Pertanian Gugat Tempo Rp100 M Gara-gara Berita Gula
06 Nov 2019, 16:45 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Aria Ananda)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Majalah Tempo digugat secara perdata oleh menteri Pertanian terkait pemberitaan. Dalam gugatannya Menteri Pertanian menuntut ganti rugi hingga Rp100 miliar.Gugatan perdata tersebut didaftarkan ke Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan pada 18 Oktober 2019.Berdasarkan situs Sistem Informasi Pelayanan Publik (SIPP) Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan, gugatan tersebut tercatat dalam nomor perkara 901/Pdt.G/2019/PN JKT.SEL.Dalam SIPP tercatat nama pihak penggugat Menteri Pertanian Republik Indonesia. Pendaftar gugatan Sabarman Saragih. Sedangkan pihak tergugat tercatat tiga orang, yakni PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk. cq Majalah Tempo, Arif Zulkifli selaku Pemimpin Redaksi Majalah Tempo, dan Bagja Hidayat selaku penanggung Jawab Berita Investigasi Majalah Tempo.Kepada CNNIndonesia.com, Kepala Biro Humas dan Informasi Publik, Agung Hendriadi belum bersedia menjelaskan gugatan tersebut."Saya enggak tahu, saya enggak tahu, masih rapat," katanya, Senin (5/11).Pihak tergugat, Tempo juga belum memberikan komentar tentang gugatan Menteri Pertanian itu. Pesan singkat dan panggilan telepon yang dikirim CNNIndonesia.com kepada Arif Zulkifli belum mendapat respons. Dalam gugatannya, penggugat meminta Pengadilan menghukum para tergugat membayar ganti rugi kepada penggugat berupa kerugian materil senilai Rp22.042.000 dan kerugian immateriil Rp100.000.000.000Pemimpin Redaksi Tempo yang baru Wahyu Dhyatmika mengatakan baru mengetahui informasi tentang gugatan tersebut, Rabu (6/11)."Kami masih mempelajari isi gugatan," kata Wahyu saat dihubungi CNNIndonesia.com. Menurut Wahyu, seharusnya kasus ini diselesaikan melalui Dewan Pers.  Kata Wahyu, persoalan ini sebenarnya telah disidangkan di Dewan pers, dan telah selesai pada 22 Oktober 2019. Dalam putusannya, Dewan Pers memberikan rekomendasi agar Majalah Tempo memuat hak jawab dari Kementerian Pertanian secara proporsional. "Kami mengembalikan masalah ini ke prosedur, sesuai Dewan pers," katanya. Penggugat juga menuntut tergugat meletakkan sita jaminan terhadap Gedung Tempo yang terletak di Jl. Palmerah Barat nomor 8, Jakarta Selatan.Menteri Pertanian juga meminta agar para tergugat memohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya kepada Penggugat atas perbuatan melawan hukum tersebut, yang harus dimuat dalam iklan yang diterbitkan oleh surat kabar Nasional dan Majalah Tempo sendiri selama tujuh hari berturut-turut dengan ukuran minimal 1/2 (setengah) halaman surat kabar.Mereka juga meminta tergugat untuk meralat dan meminta maaf kepada Penggugat (Kementerian Pertanian RI) secara tebuka di minimal 10 media cetak dan elektronik nasional mainstream atas pemberitaan Majalah Tempo Edisi 4829/9-15 September 2019. Liputan Tempo itu berjudul Investigasi Swasembada Gula cara Amran dan Isam.Dalam berita itu Tempo menulis tentang rencana Kementerian Pertanian membuka kebun tebu untuk mengejar target swasembada gula pada 2024.Tempo menulis, Menteri Pertanian Amran Sulaiman memilih pengusaha Andi Syamsuddin Arsyad untuk menggarap kebun tebu. (ugo/asa)

The Minister of Agriculture Sues Rp. 100 Billion Due to Sugar News
06 Nov 2019, 16:45 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Aria Ananda)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Tempo Magazine was sued civilly by the Minister of Agriculture related to the news. In his lawsuit the Minister of Agriculture demanded compensation of up to Rp100 billion. The civil suit was registered with the South Jakarta District Court on October 18, 2019. Based on the South Jakarta District Court's Public Service Information System (SIPP) website, the lawsuit was recorded in case number 901 / Pdt.G / 2019 / PN JKT.SEL. In SIPP the names of the plaintiffs were recorded by the Minister of Agriculture of the Republic of Indonesia. Registrar of lawsuit Sabarman Saragih. While the defendants listed three people, namely PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk. cq Tempo Magazine, Arif Zulkifli as Editor in Chief of Tempo Magazine, and Bagja Hidayat as the person in charge of Tempo Magazine Investigation News. know, it's still a meeting, "he said, Monday (5/11). The defendant, Tempo also hasn't commented on the Minister of Agriculture's lawsuit. Short messages and phone calls sent by CNNIndonesia.com to Arif Zulkifli have not yet received a response. In their lawsuit, the plaintiff asked the Court to punish the defendants to pay compensation to the plaintiff in the form of material losses amounting to Rp22,042,000 and immaterial losses of Rp100,000,000,000. The new Tempo Editor in Chief Wahyu Dhyatmika said he only learned information about the lawsuit, Wednesday (6/11). "We are still studying the contents of the lawsuit," Wahyu said when contacted by CNNIndonesia.com. According to Wahyu, this case should have been resolved through the Press Council. Wahyu said, this issue had actually been tried at the Press Council, and was completed on October 22, 2019. In its decision, the Press Council recommended that Tempo Magazine load the right of reply from the Ministry of Agriculture proportionally. "We return this matter to the procedure, according to the Press Council," he said. The plaintiff also demanded the defendant put a confiscation of collateral against the Tempo Building located on Jl. Palmerah Barat number 8, South Jakarta. The Minister of Agriculture also requested that the defendants apologize profusely to the Plaintiffs for these illegal acts, which must be contained in advertisements published by the National newspaper and Tempo Magazine itself for seven consecutive days. with a minimum size of 1/2 (half) newspaper pages. They also asked the defendant to rectify and apologize to the Plaintiff (Ministry of Agriculture of the Republic of Indonesia) openly in at least 10 mainstream national print and electronic media for reporting Tempo Magazine Edition 4829 / 9-15 September 2019. Tempo's coverage was titled Sugar Self-Sufficiency Investigation by Amran and Isam. In the news Tempo wrote about the Ministry of Agriculture's plan to open a sugar cane plantation to pursue sugar self-sufficiency targets in 2024. Tempo wrote, Agriculture Minister Amran Sulaiman chose businessman Andi Syamsuddin Arsyad to work on the plantation cane. (ugo / asa)
